department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Replacing Lycoming model TIO-540-AJ1A engine for Cessna T206H aircraft.
description: The Cessna T206H Aircraft, belonging to the Royal Canada Mounted Police, Air Services, requires a replacement engine to address a time-expired Lycoming model TIO-540-AJ1A engine.
duration_in_months: But, while the "duration_in_months" value is hinted at in other fields, I should point out that this key is indeed listed as `expectedContractEndDate-dateFinContratPrevue`, implying a specific month and year) (Ive extracted the values as you require), the output should have the correct trailing zeros.
full_summary:
### Lycoming Engine Exchange for Cessna T206H Aircraft

**Procurement Details**

* **Reference Number**: WS4645052966
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4645052966
* **Publication Date**: July 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 2, 2024, 14:00:00 (EDT)

**Procurement Description**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a Lycoming engine to replace the time-expired engine in a Cessna T206H aircraft, C-FDTM, with an airframe serial number T20608476.

**Contract Details**
- **Contract Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Goods/Services**: Aircraft digital altitude control systems

**Agreements and Trade**
- The procurement is open to suppliers from participating countries under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements listed below:
  • Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  • Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  • Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  • Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  • Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  • Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  • Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  • Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions**
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

**Contact Information**
For more details or to submit a proposal, contact:
- George-Madhu, Annie (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: annie.george-madhu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20152304](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20152304)ighbours-to
